title: President Zardari summons NA to meet on July 30
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Saturday summoned the session of the National Assembly to he be held on July 30.
The National Assembly will meet at the Parliament House on Tuesday at 1700 hours, according to a President House press release.
The president summoned the session in exercise of the powers conferred on him under Article 54 (1) of the Constitution.
